description: This Data Analytics course is built for those who want to understand, analyze, and visualize data effectively. You'll learn industry-relevant tools and techniques to uncover patterns, make data-driven decisions, and present findings clearly. Whether you're starting out or upskilling, this course will guide you through real-world scenarios with hands-on projects.
whatIsML: Data Analytics is the science of examining raw data to uncover useful information, draw conclusions, and support decision-making. It includes data collection, processing, visualization, and interpretation. Unlike Machine Learning, Data Analytics is more focused on understanding and explaining past data rather than predicting future outcomes.
whatYouWillLearn: Data Analysis Workflow: Understand the complete cycle from raw data to decision-making.
Excel & Google Sheets: Perform statistical analysis and clean data using spreadsheet tools.
SQL for Data Analytics: Query, filter, and aggregate data from relational databases.
Python for Analytics: Use libraries like pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for in-depth analysis.
courseHighlights: Tools: Excel, SQL, Python, Tableau, Power BI
Key Metrics & KPIs for Different Industries

courseModules.title: Introduction to Data Analytics
courseModules.description: Learn the fundamentals of data analytics, its importance in today's world, and different types of data analysis (descriptive, diagnostic, predictive, prescriptive).

courseModules.title: Working with Excel and Google Sheets
courseModules.description: Explore the use of spreadsheets for cleaning, sorting, filtering, and analyzing data. Learn to use formulas, pivot tables, and charts effectively.

courseModules.title: Mastering SQL for Data Analysis
courseModules.description: Write queries to retrieve, join, group, and filter data from relational databases. Practice with large datasets and real-world case studies.

courseModules.title: Python for Data Analytics
courseModules.description: Use Python with pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib to clean, manipulate, and visualize data. Learn how to automate repetitive analysis tasks.

courseModules.title: Data Cleaning & Preprocessing
courseModules.description: Understand how to handle missing data, outliers, duplicates, and data type conversions to prepare data for meaningful analysis.

courseModules.title: Data Visualization with Tableau & Power BI
courseModules.description: Create interactive charts, dashboards, and reports that clearly communicate findings using industry-standard visualization tools.

courseModules.title: Business Case Studies & KPIs
courseModules.description: Apply data analysis to real business problems like customer churn, sales forecasting, and marketing performance tracking.

courseModules.title: Storytelling with Data
courseModules.description: Learn to present data insights in a way that drives action. Focus on narrative structure, visual clarity, and executive presentation.

courseModules.title: End-to-End Capstone Project
courseModules.description: Work through a complete project: define the question, gather and clean data, analyze, visualize, and present your insights in a dashboard.

courseModules.title: Certification & Career Path Guidance
courseModules.description: Receive your course certificate and get tips on building a portfolio, preparing for interviews, and choosing a career path in analytics.
